statements: SELECT * FROM email_engagement_data WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT email_id, open_timestamp FROM email_engagement_data WHERE click_timestamp IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, open_timestamp, click_timestamp FROM email_engagement_data ORDER BY open_timestamp DESC;
SELECT email_id, user_id FROM email_engagement_data WHERE user_id IN (456, 789) AND click_timestamp IS NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM email_engagement_data;
SELECT * FROM email_engagement_data WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT email_id, open_timestamp, user_id FROM email_engagement_data WHERE open_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY open_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM email_engagement_data WHERE click_timestamp IS NOT NULL;
SELECT email_id, user_id FROM email_engagement_data WHERE open_timestamp < '2022-03-01' AND click_timestamp IS NULL ORDER BY email_id, user_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(email_id) AS total_emails, AVG(user_id) AS avg_user_id FROM email_engagement_data;
SELECT * FROM email_engagement;
SELECT email_address, open_status FROM email_engagement WHERE open_status = true;
SELECT id, engagement_date, email_address FROM email_engagement ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT id, email_address, open_status, click_status FROM email_engagement WHERE click_status = true;
SELECT e.id, e.email_address, c.clicked_link, c.click_timestamp FROM email_engagement e INNER JOIN click_data c ON e.id = c.email_id;
SELECT * FROM email_engagement WHERE open_status = true AND click_status = true ORDER BY engagement_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT email_address, engagement_date FROM email_engagement WHERE click_status = false ORDER BY engagement_date ASC;
SELECT email_address, click_data.clicked_link FROM email_engagement JOIN click_data ON email_engagement.id = click_data.email_id WHERE click_data.clicked_link LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT email_address, engagement_date FROM email_engagement WHERE engagement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT DISTINCT email_address FROM email_engagement WHERE open_status IS NOT NULL AND click_status IS NULL ORDER BY email_address;
SELECT * FROM open_rates;
SELECT email_id, open_time FROM open_rates ORDER BY open_time DESC;
SELECT email_id, interaction_type FROM engagement_data WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT email_id, interaction_type, interaction_time FROM engagement_data WHERE email_id = 123;
SELECT email_id, interaction_type, interaction_count FROM engagement_data ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;
SELECT email_id, open_time FROM open_rates WHERE id = 10
SELECT * FROM click_through_rates ORDER BY click_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT email_id, interaction_type, interaction_time FROM engagement_data WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY interaction_time ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_emails FROM open_rates
SELECT email_id, interaction_type, MAX(interaction_count) AS max_interaction_count FROM engagement_data GROUP BY email_id
SELECT * FROM email_open_rate LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, email_id, open_timestamp FROM email_open_rate WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT subject, sender_email FROM email_details ORDER BY email_id DESC
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM user_details WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM email_click_through_rate WHERE click_timestamp > '2022-01-01'

SELECT email_id, user_id, click_timestamp
FROM email_click_through_rate
ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC
LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM EmailCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, launch_date FROM EmailCampaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT contact_id, email_address, first_name, last_name FROM Contacts WHERE last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT engagement_id, engagement_type, engagement_time FROM EmailEngagements ORDER BY engagement_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClickThroughRates WHERE click_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM EmailCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, launch_date FROM EmailCampaigns WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT Contacts.first_name, Contacts.last_name, EmailCampaigns.campaign_name FROM Contacts JOIN EmailEngagements ON Contacts.contact_id = EmailEngagements.contact_id JOIN EmailCampaigns ON EmailEngagements.campaign_id = EmailCampaigns.campaign_id WHERE Contacts.email_address = 'example@example.com';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_engagements, engagement_type FROM EmailEngagements GROUP BY engagement_type ORDER BY total_engagements DESC;

SELECT Contacts.first_name, Contacts.last_name, EmailEngagements.engagement_type, EmailEngagements.engagement_time FROM Contacts LEFT JOIN EmailEngagements ON Contacts.contact_id = EmailEngagements.contact_id WHERE Contacts.first_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY Contacts.last_name ASC, EmailEngagements.engagement_time DESC;
